story.title: AITA for Telling My Cat She's Not My Favorite Child?
story.description: When you accidentally reveal your true feelings about your pets, chaos ensues! Join the drama of a cat parent caught in a hilarious dilemma.

messages.content: So I jokingly told my cat she's not my favorite child... and she stared at me like I just declared war. AITA? 😂
Bro, I think you just declared your cat's first therapy session. 🐱💔
I mean, she was just being extra moody! Like, how can I prefer a cat that acts like a diva? 😩
I can confirm, cats don't take that lightly. Mine just plotted my demise over a missing treat. 😼
Oh no, I just realized... she’s been knocking stuff off shelves since I said that! AITA for telling her? 💀
You might need to apologize with tuna. Just be careful. She could be training a hitman cat to get you! 🐾
I’ll just pretend I didn’t say anything… If she dramatically ignores me, it’ll be a win! 🙃
